subject: [Mhln] Adobe Creative Suite 3 Design Premium $269
body:
There is no sweeter sound than the crumbling of ones fellow man.

To bear is to conquer our fate.

Nothing is more fairly distributed than common sense: no one thinks he needs more of it than he already has.

Wisdom becomes nonsense in the mouth of a fanatic.

Luck can be assisted. It is not all chance with the wise.

A man who gives his children habits of industry provides for them better than by giving them a fortune.

Words are the most powerful drugs used by mankind.

All farewells should be sudden, when forever.

Everyone has 20/20 hindsight

The hardest work of all is to do nothing.

Our faith in the present dies out long before our faith in the future.

Don't waste your time striving for perfection, instead, strive for excellence -- doing your best.

If you judge, investigate.
